name: Cosmechanics
description:
Team up with three other mechanics and earn money fixing spaceships all across the galaxy in this cosmic adventure!

Cosmechanics is a frantic, local multiplayer game in which 1 - 4 players must work together to repair and maintain spaceships by rapidly completing increasingly urgent tasks. 

Tutorial included in game download. 

THE TEAM: Michael KaplorTwitter | LinkedInCacie Desautel
Twitter | Linkedin | ArstationErnest ZiegenfelderTwitter | Linkedin | ArtstationCorwin WaldronTwitter | Linkedin | ArtstationShea McAuleyTwitter | LinkedInZach OrielTwitter | LinkedIn
